titles.title: Antisemitism Inclusion in DEI Act of 2023
Antisemitism Inclusion in DEI Act of 2023
To require a publicly traded company to disclose to the Securities and Exchange Commission if the company has a diversity, equity, and inclusion program to combat antisemitism.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Antisemitism Inclusion in DEI Act of 2023
This bill requires issuers of securities to report annually whether the issuer has a diversity, equity, and inclusion program that includes training to combat antisemitism.
